attributes.action: Sack any MP who is found to have "cheated"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: on claiming expenses. They should be sacked so that they then cannot claim pensions etc. They should also be prosecuted.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
